|brand = ASUS |model = RT-AC51U |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = + |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 09/13/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_RT-AC51U |wlclass = AC750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = 90IG0150-BM3G00 |fcc_id = MSQ-RTAC51U, MSQ-RTDV00 |icid = 3568A-RTAC51U, 3568A-RTDV00 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = AP699E8C.CW93A |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S25FL128SAIF00; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 10:C3:7B, 9C:5C:8E |oui = 10:C3:7B, 9C:5C:8E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.36;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = AiCloud support |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SGE |manuf_model = AP699E8C |manuf_rev = .CW93A REV1.0 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan, OpenWrt
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/07/2016 |estreldate = 05/2014 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA98C4X90080 |asin = B01LXYT7XB |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B00S9BI9SM |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7610EN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 433 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "AP699E8C.CW93A-5-ASUS REV1.0", "H19804PN283A1" <!-- H19804PN563A2 --> :and "1447" (11/2014) is silkscreened on the board. *Model Num: 90IG0150-BM3G00 :See also [[ASUS RT-AC750]] ([https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3090333 FCC Doc]).. *Antenna: :2x 5dBi @2.4GHz ext./int antenna, :1x 3dBi @5GHz ext. PCB antenna Support available with {{TPFirmware|Padavan}}'s [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60674-4 custom] [http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60344-138#5195 firmware]
<small> * 802.11ac dual-band wireless at up to 733 Mbps for high-performance wireless * Expanded wireless coverage with two fixed high-gain antennas * USB port for printer networking, storage sharing, or 3G/4G connections * Asus AiCloud app to access, sync, share and stream files on the go-quickly and easily * Easy setup and robust controls like network monitoring through AsusWRT dashboard </small>
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-rt-ac51u.shtml ''Asus RT-AC51U'' on '''iXBT'''] (RU) :SoC: [[MediaTek]] MT7620A @580MHz 2.4GHz (2T2R 802.11bgn) :WLAN 5GHz: [[MediaTek]] MT7610E (1T1R 802.11an/ac) :OUI: 10:C3:7B *[http://foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/200-asus-rt-ac51u.html ''Asus RT-AC51U'' on '''FoxNetwork'''] (RU) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620A @580MHz WiSoC (2T2R 2.4GHz) :Flash: ''Spansion'' FL128SAIF00 16MB (SPI) :RAM: ''Winbond'' W9751G6KB-25 64MB (DDR2) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7610EN 802.11ac (1T1R 5GHz)
===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60674 On '''iXBT'''] (RU)
===Misc=== *[http://www.MediaTek.com/_en/03_news/01-2_newsDetail.php?sn=1063 ''MediaTek News - MediaTek First to Bring 802.11ac 1T1R'']
